app.containers.Index.name: Liquity Land
app.containers.Index.description: The Most Simple Frontend for Liquity decentralized borrowing protocol. Draw interest free loans against ETH as collateral. Earn ETH and LQTY tokens by depositing LUSD to Stability Pool.
app.containers.Index.keywords: liquity, ethereum, lending, cryptocurrency, borrow, defi, ETH, trove, loan, frontend, LQTY, LUSD, collateral, debt, stake, protocol, blockchain, wallet, pool, rewards, gain, kickback, land, liquity land
app.containers.Index.Header.name: Liquity Land
app.containers.Index.Banner.header: Borrow interest-free LUSD against ETH as collateral and earn LQTY rewards
app.containers.Index.Banner.paragraph: Earn 99% of the frontend rewards through kickback rate for stability providers.
app.containers.Index.Protocol.box1.conte: Ether holders can draw zero interest loans in the form of LUSD, a USD-pegged stablecoin.
app.containers.Index.Protocol.box2.conte: Borrowers only need to maintain a 110% CR, due to a highly efficient liquidation mechanism.
app.containers.Index.Protocol.box3.conte: There is no administrator with special privileges that could interfere with, alter, or halt the operation of the protocol in any way.
app.containers.Index.Protocol.box4.conte: LUSD can be redeemed at face value for the underlying ETH collateral.
